steps.title: A new navigation experience
steps.description: Let us give you a quick tour to show you where everything is.

popover.title: Find your Jobs and Templates in one place
popover.description: Welcome to the new Jobs section! Here, you can easily access all your job ad text entries and the templates. This is where you can find everything related to jobs.

popover.title: Find here your Employer Branding Text Entries
popover.description: Explore the Employer Branding section to manage and access all your employer branding text entries.

popover.title: Introducing our new Search Bar!
popover.description: Quickly locate any text entry or functionality across the platform. Simply type what you're looking for, and navigate directly to the right place in seconds.

popover.title: Manage Corporate Terminology, Users and Teams
popover.description: Corporate Terminology and User Management are now in Account Settings. Add phrases to exclude from bias analysis, invite new users, and manage teams.
